atd_http_post_error.name: atd_http_post_error
atd_http_post_error.summary: Fires when there is a post error to AtD.

http-error.label: http-error
http-error.description: http-error The error that AtD runs into.

contact_form_akismet.name: contact_form_akismet
contact_form_akismet.summary:
Fires after a comment has been marked by Akismet.

Typically this means the comment is spam.

csstidy_optimize_subvalue.name: csstidy_optimize_subvalue
csstidy_optimize_subvalue.summary: Fires before optimizing the Custom CSS subvalue.

custom_css_submitbox_misc_actions.name: custom_css_submitbox_misc_actions
custom_css_submitbox_misc_actions.summary: Allows addition of elements to the submit box for custom css on the wp-admin side.

custom_design_header.name: custom_design_header
custom_design_header.summary: Fires right before the custom css page begins.

did_jetpack_search_query.name: did_jetpack_search_query
did_jetpack_search_query.summary:
Fires after a search request has been performed.

Includes the following info in the $query parameter:

array args Array of Elasticsearch arguments for the search array response Raw API response, JSON decoded int response_code HTTP response code of the request float elapsed_time Roundtrip time of the search request, in milliseconds float es_time Amount of time Elasticsearch spent running the request, in milliseconds string url API url that was queried

query.label: query
query.description: Array of information about the query performed

display_activate_module_setting_-module_.name: display_activate_module_setting_{$module_id}
display_activate_module_setting_-module_.summary:
Fires to diplay a custom module activation screen.

To add a module actionation screen use Jetpack::module_configuration_activation_screen method. Example: Jetpack::module_configuration_activation_screen( 'manage', array( $this, 'manage_activate_screen' ) );

failed_jetpack_search_query.name: failed_jetpack_search_query
failed_jetpack_search_query.summary: Fires after a search query request has failed

Array.label: Array
Array.description: Array containing the response code and response from the failed search query

grunion_pre_message_sent.name: grunion_pre_message_sent
grunion_pre_message_sent.summary: Fires right before the contact form message is sent via email to the recipient specified in the contact form.

extra_values.label: extra_values
extra_values.description: Contact form fields not included in $all_values

infinite_scroll_render.name: infinite_scroll_render
infinite_scroll_render.summary: Fires when rendering Infinite Scroll posts.

jetpack_bump_stats_extras.name: jetpack_bump_stats_extras
jetpack_bump_stats_extras.summary: Fires for each Social Media account being saved in the Social Media Widget settings.

social-media-links-widget-svcs.label: social-media-links-widget-svcs
social-media-links-widget-svcs.description: social-media-links-widget-svcs Type of action to track.

val.label: val
val.description: Name of the Social Media account being saved.

jetpack_contact_info_widget_end.name: jetpack_contact_info_widget_end
jetpack_contact_info_widget_end.summary: Fires at the end of Contact Info widget.

jetpack_contact_info_widget_start.name: jetpack_contact_info_widget_start
jetpack_contact_info_widget_start.summary: Fires at the beginning of the Contact Info widget, after the title.

jetpack_copy_post.name: jetpack_copy_post
jetpack_copy_post.summary:
Fires after all updates have been performed, and default content filters have been added.

Allows for any cleanup or post operations, and default content filters can be removed or modified.

update_results.label: update_results
update_results.description: Results of all update operations, allowing action to be taken.

jetpack_custom_css_customizer_controls.name: jetpack_custom_css_customizer_controls
jetpack_custom_css_customizer_controls.summary: An action to grab on to if another Jetpack Module would like to add its own controls.

jetpack_daily_akismet_meta_cleanup_after.name: jetpack_daily_akismet_meta_cleanup_after
jetpack_daily_akismet_meta_cleanup_after.summary: Fires right after deleting the _feedback_akismet_values post meta on $feedback_ids

jetpack_daily_akismet_meta_cleanup_befor.name: jetpack_daily_akismet_meta_cleanup_before
jetpack_daily_akismet_meta_cleanup_befor.summary: Fires right before deleting the _feedback_akismet_values post meta on $feedback_ids

jetpack_embed_to_shortcode.name: jetpack_embed_to_shortcode
jetpack_embed_to_shortcode.summary: Fires before the YouTube embed is transformed into a shortcode.

jetpack_holiday_snow_option_updated.name: jetpack_holiday_snow_option_updated
jetpack_holiday_snow_option_updated.summary: Fires when the holiday snow option is updated.

jetpack_plugin_installed.name: jetpack_plugin_installed
jetpack_plugin_installed.summary: Signals to the sync listener that a plugin was installed and a sync action reflecting the installation and the plugin info should be sent

jetpack_plugin_update_failed.name: jetpack_plugin_update_failed
jetpack_plugin_update_failed.summary: Sync that a plugin update failed

jetpack_post_meta_batch_delete.name: jetpack_post_meta_batch_delete
jetpack_post_meta_batch_delete.summary: Used for syncing deletion of batch post meta

jetpack_search_render_filters.name: jetpack_search_render_filters
jetpack_search_render_filters.summary: Responsible for rendering filters to narrow down search results.

filters.label: filters
filters.description: The possible filters for the current query.

post_types.label: post_types
post_types.description: An array of post types to limit filtering to.

jetpack_search_render_filters_widget_tit.name: jetpack_search_render_filters_widget_title
jetpack_search_render_filters_widget_tit.summary: Responsible for displaying the title of the Jetpack Search filters widget.

args[\u2019before_title\u2019].label: args[’before_title’]
args[\u2019before_title\u2019].description: The HTML tag to display before the title

args[\u2019after_title\u2019].label: args[’after_title’]
args[\u2019after_title\u2019].description: The HTML tag to display after the title

jetpack_site_verification_validate.name: jetpack_site_verification_validate
jetpack_site_verification_validate.summary: Fire after each Verification code was validated.

code.label: code
code.description: Verification service code provided in field in the Tools menu.

jetpack_sso_handle_login.name: jetpack_sso_handle_login
jetpack_sso_handle_login.summary: Fires after we got login information from WordPress.com.

jetpack_sso_pre_handle_login.name: jetpack_sso_pre_handle_login
jetpack_sso_pre_handle_login.summary: Fires before Jetpack's SSO modifies the log in form.

jetpack_stats_extra.name: jetpack_stats_extra
jetpack_stats_extra.summary:
Fires when an item is displayed on the front end.

Can be used to track stats about the number of displays for a specific item

widget_view.label: widget_view
widget_view.description: widget_view Item type (e.g. widget, or embed).

jetpack_subscriptions_comment_form_submi.name: jetpack_subscriptions_comment_form_submission
jetpack_subscriptions_comment_form_submi.summary: Fires on each comment subscription form submission.

result.label: result
result.description: Result of form submission: NULL on success, WP_Error otherwise.

post_ids.label: post_ids
post_ids.description: An array of post IDs that the user subscribed to, 0 means blog subscription.

jetpack_subscriptions_form_submission.name: jetpack_subscriptions_form_submission
jetpack_subscriptions_form_submission.summary: Fires on each subscription form submission.View Example

result.label: result
result.description: Result of form submission: success, invalid_email, already, error.

jetpack_sync_action_before_enqueue.name: jetpack_sync_action_before_enqueue
jetpack_sync_action_before_enqueue.summary: Add an action hook to execute when anything on the whitelist gets sent to the queue to sync.

jetpack_sync_save_post.name: jetpack_sync_save_post
jetpack_sync_save_post.summary: Filter that is used to add to the post flags ( meta data ) when a post gets published

update.label: update
update.description: Whether this is an existing post being updated or not.

jetpack_widget_top_posts_after_fields.name: jetpack_widget_top_posts_after_fields
jetpack_widget_top_posts_after_fields.summary:
Fires after the fields are displayed in the Top Posts Widget settings in wp-admin.

Allow adding extra content after the fields are displayed.

args.label: args
args.description: {     @param array $instance The widget instance.     @param object $this The class object. }

jetpack_widget_top_posts_after_post.name: jetpack_widget_top_posts_after_post
jetpack_widget_top_posts_after_post.summary: Fires after each Top Post result, inside <li>.View Example

jetpack_widget_top_posts_before_post.name: jetpack_widget_top_posts_before_post
jetpack_widget_top_posts_before_post.summary: Fires before each Top Post result, inside <li>.View Example

jp_carousel_enqueue_assets.name: jp_carousel_enqueue_assets
jp_carousel_enqueue_assets.summary:
Fires after carousel assets are enqueued for the first time.

Allows for adding additional assets to the carousel page.

first_run.label: first_run
first_run.description: First load if Carousel on the page.

localized_strings.label: localized_strings
localized_strings.description: Array of strings passed to the Jetpack js file.

jp_carousel_post_attachment_comment.name: jp_carousel_post_attachment_comment
jp_carousel_post_attachment_comment.summary: Fires before adding a new comment to the database via the get_attachment_comments ajax endpoint.

jp_carousel_thumbnails_shown.name: jp_carousel_thumbnails_shown
jp_carousel_thumbnails_shown.summary: Fires when thumbnails are shown in Carousel.

jpp_log_failed_attempt.name: jpp_log_failed_attempt
jpp_log_failed_attempt.summary: Fires before every failed login attempt.

Information.label: Information
Information.description: Information about failed login attempt   [     ’login’ => (string) Username or email used in failed login attempt   ]

mobile_app_promo_download.name: mobile_app_promo_download
mobile_app_promo_download.summary: Fires before you're redirected to download page if you clicked the mobile app promo link in mobile footer

mobile_force_mobile.name: mobile_force_mobile
mobile_force_mobile.summary: In Jetpack's Mobile theme, fires after the user taps on the link to go back from full site to mobile site.

mobile_reject_mobile.name: mobile_reject_mobile
mobile_reject_mobile.summary: In Jetpack's Mobile theme, fires after the user taps on the link to display a full version of the site.

mobile_setup.name: mobile_setup
mobile_setup.summary: Fires after Jetpack's mobile theme has been setup.

post_admin_screen_sharing.name: post_admin_screen_sharing
post_admin_screen_sharing.summary: Fires at the bottom of the admin sharing settings screen.

pre_admin_screen_sharing.name: pre_admin_screen_sharing
pre_admin_screen_sharing.summary: Fires at the top of the admin sharing settings screen.

rest_api_delete_publicize_connection.name: rest_api_delete_publicize_connection
rest_api_delete_publicize_connection.summary: Fires when a Publicize connection is deleted.

rest_api_inserted_post.name: rest_api_inserted_post
rest_api_inserted_post.summary: Fires when a post is created via the REST API.

insert.label: insert
insert.description: Data used to build the post.

restapi_theme_after_setup_theme.name: restapi_theme_after_setup_theme
restapi_theme_after_setup_theme.summary:
Fires functions hooked onto `after_setup_theme` by the theme for the purpose of the REST API.

The REST API does not load the theme when processing requests. To enable theme-based functionality, the API will load the '/functions.php', '/inc/jetpack.compat.php', '/inc/jetpack.php', '/includes/jetpack.compat.php files of the theme (parent and child) and copy functions hooked onto 'after_setup_theme' within those files.

restapi_theme_init.name: restapi_theme_init
restapi_theme_init.summary:
Fires functions hooked onto `init` by the theme for the purpose of the REST API.

The REST API does not load the theme when processing requests. To enable theme-based functionality, the API will load the '/functions.php', '/inc/jetpack.compat.php', '/inc/jetpack.php', '/includes/jetpack.compat.php files of the theme (parent and child) and copy functions hooked onto 'init' within those files.

safecss_link_tag_post.name: safecss_link_tag_post
safecss_link_tag_post.summary: Fires after creating the  in the  element for the custom css stylesheet.

safecss_migrate_post.name: safecss_migrate_post
safecss_migrate_post.summary: Allows additional work when migrating safecss from wp_options to wp_post.

safecss_parse_post.name: safecss_parse_post
safecss_parse_post.summary: Fires after parsing the css with CSSTidy, but only if the preprocessor is not cinfigured for use.

safecss_parse_pre.name: safecss_parse_pre
safecss_parse_pre.summary: Fires before parsing the css with CSSTidy, but only if the preprocessor is not configured for use.

safecss_print_pre.name: safecss_print_pre
safecss_print_pre.summary: Fires right before printing the custom CSS inside the  element.

safecss_save_pre.name: safecss_save_pre
safecss_save_pre.summary: Fires prior to saving custom css values. Necessitated because the core WordPress save_pre filters were removed: - content_save_pre - content_filtered_save_pre

args.label: args
args.description: { Array of custom CSS arguments. @type string $css The CSS (or LESS or Sass). @type bool $is_preview Whether this CSS is preview or published. @type string preprocessor Which CSS preprocessor to use. @type bool $add_to_existing Whether this CSS replaces the theme’s CSS or supplements it. @type int $content_width A custom $content_width to go along with this CSS. }

sharing_bump_stats.name: sharing_bump_stats
sharing_bump_stats.summary: Fires when a post is shared via one of the sharing buttons.

args.label: args
args.description: Aray of information about the sharing service.

sharing_email_send_post.name: sharing_email_send_post
sharing_email_send_post.summary: Fires when an email is sent via the Email sharing button.

data.label: data
data.description: Array of information about the shared message.

sharing_get_button_state.name: sharing_get_button_state
sharing_get_button_state.summary: Get the state of a sharing button.

args.label: args
args.description: {  State of a sharing button.  @type string $id Service ID.  @type array $options Array of all sharing options.  @type array $service Details about a service. }

sharing_get_services_state.name: sharing_get_services_state
sharing_get_services_state.summary: Control the state of the list of sharing services.

args.label: args
args.description: {  Array of options describing the state of the sharing services.  @type array $services List of all available service names and classes.  @type array $available Validated list of all available service names and classes.  @type array $hidden List of services hidden behind a ”More” button.  @type array $visible List of visible services.  @type array $this->get_blog_services() Array of Sharing Services currently enabled. }

sharing_global_options.name: sharing_global_options
sharing_global_options.summary: Fires at the end of the sharing global options settings table.

sharing_new_service_form.name: sharing_new_service_form
sharing_new_service_form.summary: Fires after the custom sharing service form

widget_conditions_delete.name: widget_conditions_delete
widget_conditions_delete.summary: Fires after the widget visibility conditions are deleted.

widget_conditions_save.name: widget_conditions_save
widget_conditions_save.summary: Fires after the widget visibility conditions are saved.

wpcom_json_api_objects.name: wpcom_json_api_objects
wpcom_json_api_objects.summary: Fires on each GET request to a specific endpoint.

wpcom_json_api_options.name: wpcom_json_api_options
wpcom_json_api_options.summary:
Fires before the page output.

Can be used to specify custom header options.
